WorkItem.Description: Since most druids I know keep multiple sets of armor and use ClosetGnome or ItemRack type addons to manage it all, it would be very nice to be able to import my sets from there instead of from Armory.

Comments.Message: The extra code required to do this would be rather high, would be frought with compatability issues as different versions of the very wide array of that sort of addons are released, and wouldn't necessarily be complete (no enchants or gems in some cases). Much easier and more reliable to just switch sets, relog, and hit the armory.
/bump - come on... you know you want this. :)
If you want it, go for it. But the extremely minor benefit compared to the extremely major development time (both initial, and in upkeep), is just not worth it for me.

You can also import from CharacterProfiler.  This is especially handy when you want to grab a new set of gear quickly.  All you have to do is /logout and the file is updated.  (Quitting WoW is not necessary.)
